results.title: The effect of cardiac sympathetic denervation through bilateral stellate ganglionectomy on electrical properties of the heart.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol
results.text_hl: In addition, our data suggest that the mechanism of cardiac @<m>DISEASE_Horner_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006732 @@@sympathetic@@@ denervation by SGX surgery is more similar to the administration of beta-blocker @CHEMICAL_esmolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C036604 @@@esmolol@@@ than @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Xie X, Visweswaran R, Guzman PA, Smith RM, Osborn JW, Tolkacheva EG. The effect of cardiac sympathetic denervation through bilateral stellate ganglionectomy on electrical properties of the heart. Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol. 2011 Jul;301(1):H192-9. PMID: 21498778

results.title: [Nervous mechanisms of spontaneous oscillations of systolic blood pressure and heart rate].
results.text_hl: HR fluctuations in the low frequency regime were diminished by vagal blockade or cardiac @<m>DISEASE_Horner_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006732 @@@sympathetic@@@ blockade (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@).

citations.NLM: Elghozi JL, Japundzic N, Grichois ML, Zitoun P. [Nervous mechanisms of spontaneous oscillations of systolic blood pressure and heart rate]. Arch Mal Coeur Vaiss. 1990 Jul;83(8):1065-8. PMID: 2124441

results.title: Spectral analysis of blood pressure and heart rate in conscious rats: effects of autonomic blockers.
results.text_hl: Heart rate fluctuations in the low-frequency regime were diminished by vagal blockade or cardiac @<m>DISEASE_Horner_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006732 @@@sympathetic@@@ blockade (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@).

citations.NLM: Japundzic N, Grichois ML, Zitoun P, Laude D, Elghozi JL. Spectral analysis of blood pressure and heart rate in conscious rats: effects of autonomic blockers. J Auton Nerv Syst. 1990 Jun;30(2):91-100. PMID: 1973426
citations.BibTeX: @article{1973426, title={Spectral analysis of blood pressure and heart rate in conscious rats: effects of autonomic blockers.}, author={Japundzic N and Grichois ML and Zitoun P and Laude D and Elghozi JL}, journal={J Auton Nerv Syst}, volume={30}, number={2}, pages={91-100}}

results.title: Automation of analysis of cardiovascular autonomic function from chronic measurements of arterial pressure in conscious rats.
results.text_hl: Subsequent cardiac @<m>DISEASE_Horner_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006732 @@@sympathetic@@@ blockade (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, 1 mg kg(-1), I.V.) reduced the low frequency (LF) to HF ratio (LF:HF) of the PI (P < 0.01), which was consistent with the observed reduction in HR.

citations.NLM: Waki H, Katahira K, Polson JW, Kasparov S, Murphy D, Paton JF. Automation of analysis of cardiovascular autonomic function from chronic measurements of arterial pressure in conscious rats. Exp Physiol. 2006 Jan;91(1):201-13. PMID: 16239254
